overview: Decades before Magic Mike and The Chippendales there was Crystal T's â€“ the home of Melbourne's very own all-male nude revue.  FOR HER EYES ONLY is a fascinating 1985 documentary by filmmaker Brian Jones ('Coming Of Age') that shows Melbourne, Australia at a turning point, shaking off the prudishness of the past to embrace a new sexual freedom that was sweeping the nation.
title: FOR HER EYES ONLY
